data.name: Guardians of Middle-earth: The Company of Dwarves Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The Dwarves are at their best in groups. Get access to the following Guardians and their Alternates:

  • Ori
  • Gloin
  • Kili
  • Nori
  • Thorin Oakenshield
  • And as a bonus get 10,000 Gold for use in-game.
data.about_the_game:
The Dwarves are at their best in groups. Get access to the following Guardians and their Alternates:

  • Ori
  • Gloin
  • Kili
  • Nori
  • Thorin Oakenshield
  • And as a bonus get 10,000 Gold for use in-game.
data.short_description: The Dwarves are at their best in groups. Get access to the following Guardians and their Alternates:OriGloinKiliNoriThorin OakenshieldAnd as a bonus get 10,000 Gold for use in-game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimo:
  • SO: 32-bit: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Procesador: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.4 GHz | AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz or better
  • Memoria: 2 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS | AMD Radeon 3850 or better
  • DirectX: Versión 10
  • Red: Conexión de banda ancha a Internet
  • Almacenamiento: 8 GB de espacio disponible
  • Notas adicionales: Windows XP and DirectX® 9.0c and below not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recomendado:
  • SO: 64-bit: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Procesador: Intel Core i5 750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4GHz or better
  • Memoria: 4 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6950 or better
  • DirectX: Versión 11
  • Red: Conexión de banda ancha a Internet
  • Almacenamiento: 8 GB de espacio disponible
  • Notas adicionales: Windows XP and DirectX® 9.0c and below not supported
